statements: UPDATE Market_Analysis SET company_name = 'TechCo', revenue = 15000.50, data_source = 'Internal' WHERE market_id = 1;
UPDATE Market_Analysis SET revenue = 20000.75, company_name = 'FinanceInc', data_source = 'External' WHERE market_id = 2;
UPDATE Market_Analysis SET revenue = revenue + 1000 WHERE market_id = 1
UPDATE Market_Analysis SET company_name = 'Updated Company', data_source = 'New Source', revenue = 50000.50 WHERE market_id = 2
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET revenue = 150000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE DataSources SET data_type = 'New Data Type' WHERE source_id = 3;
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET revenue = 150000, market_share = 0.25 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp'
UPDATE DataSources SET data_type = 'Updated Data' WHERE source_name = 'Source A'
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET source_table='new_table', analysis_name='Updated Analysis' WHERE analysis_id=123;
UPDATE BusinessData SET revenue=50000.50, employees=1000 WHERE data_id=456;
UPDATE MarketAnalysis SET source_table='NewSourceTable', analysis_date='2023-09-15' WHERE analysis_id=1;
UPDATE BusinessData SET revenue=125000.50, employees=500 WHERE company_name='XYZ Corp';
UPDATE market_analysis SET revenue = 25000.00, industry = 'Technology' WHERE company_name = 'ABC Corp';
UPDATE sales_data SET total_revenue = 15000.50, units_sold = 100 WHERE product_name = 'Product X';
UPDATE market_analysis SET revenue = 15000.50, market_share = 12.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales_data SET total_revenue = 75000.00, units_sold = 500 WHERE product_name = 'Product ABC';
UPDATE MarketAnalysisData SET revenue = 250000.50, market_share = 0.15 WHERE company_name = 'ABC Company';
UPDATE SalesData SET quantity = 20, price = 75.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE sale_id = 1001;
UPDATE MarketAnalysisData SET revenue = 500000, market_share = 0.15 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE CustomerData SET email = 'newemail@example.com', address = '123 Main Street, City, Country' WHERE customer_id = 101;
